verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus you are justice, you are mercy, you are love
Jesus our redeemer, all thats broken you restore

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: So let hope arise, in every corner of the earth, let hope arise

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Cause in the middle of the darkness, the light of the world has come
You will make all things new
Youll finish what you started, by the power of your mighty love
You will make all things new, Jesus you will make all things new

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Jesus you are reigning, you are righteous, you are Lord
Jesus youre the saviour every heart is longing for

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: So let hope arise, in every corner of the earth, let hope arise

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Cause in the middle of the darkness, the light of the world has come
You will make all things new
Youll finish what you started, by the power of your mighty love
You will make all things new, Jesus you will make all things new

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
So sing, sing; ‘The Lord is our deliverer’
Sing, sing; ‘The Lord is our deliverer’
Sing, sing; ‘The Lord is our deliverer’
‘His love will never fail’
